page.title: 03Fisher Tarn Reservoir
page.content: {Fisher Tarn }consists of 545,454 cubic metres of water which is 120,000,000 gallons approx.It does not go through a bacterial process to clean it, but chlorine is added and it is strained. The dam was started in 1897 and the whole reservoir was finished in 1934.Only one person works on it with a daily check. It has overflowed twice since it was built. It supplies 20,000 gallons a week for Paddy Lane and it is not used for Kendal anymore.Soon it will not be used at all and all the water will come from Hawswater and Thirlmere.
